name: Turtles and Seashells
description:
Made this for the Amber Game Jam.

It has very little to do with the theme of Subtraction, excepting that the number of moves you have left subtracts by one each time you move. I've never finished a game, so I focused more on getting it done than keeping in line with the theme, which meant scrapping parts of the game that had to do with subtraction.

Link to the font used: https://www.fontspace.com/press-start-2p-font-f11591
